member.name: BITMAPFILEHEADER
member.summary: The BITMAPFILEHEADER structure contains information about the type, size, and layout of a file that contains a DIB.

member.name: BITMAPFILEHEADER.bfType
member.summary: The file type; must be BM.

member.name: BITMAPFILEHEADER.bfSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the bitmap file.

member.name: BITMAPFILEHEADER.bfOffBits
member.summary: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the BITMAPFILEHEADER structure to the bitmap bits.
